text.title: Interactive Visualisation of UK BzzAgent Network
text.more:
Relationship between Bzz agents using their twitter connections with a directed edge from A to B if at least 50% of the followers of A are also followers of B;
Click on a node (BzzAgent) to see connections or search for a specific node using the search box on the left;
Zoom in and out using the zoom buttons below.
text.intro: This visualisation displays the layout of the UK Bzz Agent network, and the relationship of different Bzz agents to each other, based on their shared twitter connections.
